title: Battle Bears Zero v1.1.0
description:
Award winning 3D Multiplayer Shooter! WIL'S FINEST HOUR continues the story of BATTLE BEARS across both single-player campaign and multiplayer arcade shooter gameplay with over 22 minutes of brand NEW BATTLE BEARS cutscenes.

It's Wil's finest hour! Join Wil and his computer companion aBBi on an adventure across 12 challenging levels with over 10 new types of weapons. Then, TAKE THE FIGHT ONLINE as you and a friend battle hordes of Huggable's in 3D MULTIPLAYER shootouts!

BRAND NEW CUTSCENES 
Over 22 minutes of awesome never before seen animated cutscenes featuring the story of the Battle Bears.

10 NEW WEAPON TYPES, DOZENS OF POWERUPS
Sniper rifles, bags of "filth", guns that fire black holes. You'll need all the firepower you can get to battle the Huggable army.

CO-OP SHOOTER ACTION
Take the battle online with a friend in online co-op mode. Face wave after wave of advancing Huggable's as Wil and aBBi join forces. Upload your scores for the world to see and unlock even greater weapons and power-ups

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.skyvu.battlebearszero" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.skyvu.battlebearszero</a>


Instructions:

1.Install the APK
2.Copy 'net.skyvu.battlebearszero' folder to 'Sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the Game
